trans-unit.source: Represents a grammar element that contains phrases or other entities that a user can speak to produce a successful recognition.
trans-unit.target: Representerer et grammatikk-element som inneholder uttrykk eller andre enheter som en bruker kan snakke for å lage en vellykket gjenkjenning.

trans-unit.source: An SrgsItem object can consist of phrases, entities such as <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef> objects, logical combinations of phrases and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef> objects, and so on.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som SrgsItem kan bestå av uttrykk, enheter som <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef>objekter, logiske kombinasjoner av uttrykk og <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef>objekter og så videre.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.Elements%2A> property on the SrgsItem class to gain access to the constituents of an SrgsItem object.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.Elements%2A>egenskapen for SrgsItem klassen for å få tilgang til constituents objektets SrgsItem.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.Elements%2A>

trans-unit.source: The order in which SrgsItem objects appear in a given <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> object specifies the order in which a user must speak them.
trans-unit.target: Rekkefølgen som SrgsItem objekter vises i en gitt <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>objektet angir rekkefølgen som en bruker må snakke dem.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>

trans-unit.source: By default, the contents of an SrgsItem must be spoken exactly once.
trans-unit.target: Som standard, må du talte innholdet i en SrgsItem nøyaktig én gang.

trans-unit.source: To specify that the contents of an SrgsItem must be spoken repeatedly, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.%23ctor%2A> constructor and set the `repeatCount` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil angi at innholdet i en SrgsItem må være talte gjentatte ganger, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.%23ctor%2A>konstruktører og sett den `repeatCount` parameteren.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Similarly, to specify a range for the number of times that an SrgsItem can be spoken, create the SrgsItem with one of the constructors that set the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.MaxRepeat%2A> property and the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.MinRepeat%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Opprett på samme måte i SrgsItem med én av konstruktører som er angitt for å angi et område for hvor mange ganger som en SrgsItem kan talte, den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.MaxRepeat%2A>egenskapen og <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.MinRepeat%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.MinRepeat%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.MaxRepeat%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the SrgsItem already exists, you can use one of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.SetRepeat%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.SetRepeat%2A> methods to specify repeats.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det finnes allerede i SrgsItem, kan du bruke ett av de <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.SetRepeat%2A?displayProperty=fullName>eller <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.SetRepeat%2A>metoder for å angi gjentas.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.SetRepeat%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.SetRepeat%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can also specify the probability that an item will be repeatedly spoken by setting the value of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.RepeatProbability%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også angi sannsynligheten for at et element skal være gjentatte ganger leses høyt av verdien for den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.RepeatProbability%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.RepeatProbability%2A>

trans-unit.source: SrgsItem objects within an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> object comprise a list of alternatives from which the user can speak one.
trans-unit.target: SrgsItem objekter i en <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf>objektet utgjør en liste med alternativer som brukeren kan snakke én.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.Weight%2A> property to specify the likelihood that a given item in the list will be spoken.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.Weight%2A>til å angi sannsynligheten for at et gitt element i listen skal talte.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.Weight%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SrgsItem class represents the `item` element that is defined in the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761).
trans-unit.target: SrgsItem klassen representerer den `item` element som er definert i World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) [tale Recognition grammatikk spesifikasjonen (SRGS) versjon 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761).

trans-unit.source: For information about the SRGS `item` element and details about its support by System.Speech, see [item Element](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/10cba7dd-994e-4aa7-907e-0669e5467d60).
trans-unit.target: For informasjon om SRGS `item` elementet og detaljer om støtten av System.Speech, kan du se [element elementet](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/10cba7dd-994e-4aa7-907e-0669e5467d60).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem"></xref> class and specifies the number of times that its contents must be spoken.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem"> </xref> klasse og angir hvor mange ganger innholdet må talte.

trans-unit.source: This constructor sets <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.MaxRepeat%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.MinRepeat%2A> properties of the new <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> to the value in `repeatCount`.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren angir <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.MaxRepeat%2A>og <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.MinRepeat%2A>egenskapene for den nye <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem>verdien i `repeatCount`.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.MinRepeat%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.MaxRepeat%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of times that the item must be spoken.
trans-unit.target: Antall ganger elementet må være talte.

trans-unit.source: repeatCount is negative or is larger than 255.
trans-unit.target: repeatCounter negativ eller større enn 255.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem"></xref> class and specifies an array of <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsElement"></xref> objects to add to this instance.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem"> </xref> klasse og angir en matrise av <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsElement"> </xref> objekter til å legge til denne forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: The array of objects to add to the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Matrise av objekter til å legge til den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: elements is .
trans-unit.target: elementsis .

trans-unit.source: Any member of the elements array is .
trans-unit.target: Et medlem av den elements matrise er .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem"></xref> class and specifies its textual contents.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem"> </xref> klasse og angir de tekstbaserte innholdet.

trans-unit.source: The text associated with the item.
trans-unit.target: Teksten som er knyttet til elementet.

trans-unit.source: text is .
trans-unit.target: textis .

trans-unit.source: text is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: texter en tom streng.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem"></xref> class and specifies minimum and maximum repetition counts.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem"> </xref> klasse og angir antall minste og største gjentakelse.

trans-unit.source: The minimum number of times that the text in the item must be repeated.
trans-unit.target: Minste antall ganger teksten i elementet må gjentas.

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of times that the text in the item can be repeated.
trans-unit.target: Maksimalt antall ganger teksten i elementet kan gjentas.

trans-unit.source: min is negative or larger than 255.
trans-unit.target: miner negativ eller større enn 255.

trans-unit.source: max is negative or larger than 255.
trans-unit.target: maxer negativ eller større enn 255.

trans-unit.source: min is larger than max.
trans-unit.target: miner større enn max.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem"></xref> class, specifies an array of <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsElement"></xref> objects to add to this instance, and sets minimum and maximum repetition counts.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem"> </xref> klasse, angir en matrise av <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsElement"> </xref> objekter for å legge til denne forekomsten, og angir antall minste og største gjentakelse.

trans-unit.source: The minimum number of times that the contents of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem"></xref> object must be repeated.
trans-unit.target: Det minste antallet ganger som innholdet i den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem"> </xref> objektet må gjentas.

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of times that the contents of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem"></xref> object can be repeated.
trans-unit.target: Maksimalt antall ganger som innholdet i den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem"> </xref> objekt kan gjentas.

trans-unit.source: The array of objects to add to the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Matrise av objekter til å legge til den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: elements is .
trans-unit.target: elementsis .

trans-unit.source: Any member of the elements array is .
trans-unit.target: Et medlem av den elements matrise er .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem"></xref> class, specifies the text associated with the item, and specifies minimum and maximum repetition counts.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem"> </xref> klassen angir teksten som er knyttet til elementet, og angir minimum og maksimum gjentakelse antall.

trans-unit.source: The minimum number of times that the item must be repeated.
trans-unit.target: Minste antall ganger elementet må gjentas.

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of times that the item can be repeated.
trans-unit.target: Maksimalt antall ganger elementet kan gjentas.

trans-unit.source: The text associated with the item.
trans-unit.target: Teksten som er knyttet til elementet.

trans-unit.source: min is negative or larger than 255.
trans-unit.target: miner negativ eller større enn 255.

trans-unit.source: max is negative or larger than 255.
trans-unit.target: maxer negativ eller større enn 255.

trans-unit.source: min is larger than max.
trans-unit.target: miner større enn max.

trans-unit.source: Adds an object to the collection of objects contained in this <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Legger til et objekt i samlingen av objekter i denne <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: The Add method appends an element to the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.Elements%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Add-metode legger til et nytt element i <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.Elements%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.Elements%2A>

trans-unit.source: The object to add.
trans-unit.target: Objektet til å legge til.

trans-unit.source: element is.
trans-unit.target: elementis.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of objects contained by the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Henter objektsamlingen som inneholder den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: The collection of objects contained by the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Samlingen av objekter som inneholder den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: Gets the maximum number of times that a user can speak the contents of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter maksimalt antall ganger som en bruker kan snakke innholdet i den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To set this property, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.SetRepeat%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil angi denne egenskapen, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.SetRepeat%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.SetRepeat%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property represents a portion of the `repeat` attribute defined by the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](http://www.w3.org/TR/speech-grammar/).
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen representerer en del av den `repeat` attributtet er definert av World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) [tale Recognition grammatikk spesifikasjonen (SRGS) versjon 1.0](http://www.w3.org/TR/speech-grammar/).

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of times that a user can speak the contents of the item.
trans-unit.target: Maksimalt antall ganger som en bruker kan snakke innholdet i elementet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the minimum number of times that a user must speak the contents of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter antallet ganger brukeren må snakke innholdet i den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To set this property, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.SetRepeat%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil angi denne egenskapen, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.SetRepeat%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.SetRepeat%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property represents a portion of the `repeat` attribute of the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS).
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen representerer en del av den `repeat` attributtet for World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) tale Recognition grammatikk spesifikasjonen (SRGS).

trans-unit.source: The minimum number of times that a user can speak the contents of the item.
trans-unit.target: Minste antall ganger som en bruker kan snakke innholdet i elementet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the probability that a user will repeat the contents of this <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir sannsynligheten for at en bruker gjentas innholdet i dette <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: The property applies only to items whose <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.MinRepeat%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.MaxRepeat%2A> properties have been explicitly set to non-default values, either by a constructor for <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem>or by the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.SetRepeat%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen gjelder bare for elementer som har egenskapen <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.MinRepeat%2A>og <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.MaxRepeat%2A>Egenskaper er eksplisitt satt til ikke-standard verdier, som en konstruktør for <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem>eller ved den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.SetRepeat%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.SetRepeat%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.MaxRepeat%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.MinRepeat%2A>

trans-unit.source: The probability, as a floating point value, that the contents of this item will be repeatedly spoken.
trans-unit.target: Sannsynlighet, som et flyttall peke verdi, innholdet for dette elementet skal være gjentatte ganger talte.

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to set RepeatProbability to a value that is negative or larger than 1.0.
trans-unit.target: Er gjort forsøk på å angi RepeatProbability til en verdi som er negativ eller større enn 1,0.

trans-unit.source: Sets the number of times that the contents of an <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem"></xref> must be spoken.
trans-unit.target: Angir hvor mange ganger som innholdet i en <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem"> </xref> må være talte.

trans-unit.source: This method sets the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.MaxRepeat%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.MinRepeat%2A> properties to the value in `count`.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden angir den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.MaxRepeat%2A>og <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.MinRepeat%2A>Egenskaper verdien i `count`.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.MinRepeat%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.MaxRepeat%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of times that the item must be spoken.
trans-unit.target: Antall ganger elementet må være talte.

trans-unit.source: count is less than 0 or greater than 255.
trans-unit.target: counter mindre enn 0 eller større enn 255.

trans-unit.source: Sets the minimum number of times and the maximum number of times that an item can be spoken.
trans-unit.target: Angir minimum antall ganger og maksimalt antall ganger et element kan talte.

trans-unit.source: The minimum number of times that the item must be spoken.
trans-unit.target: Minste antall ganger elementet må være talte.

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of times that the item can be spoken.
trans-unit.target: Maksimalt antall ganger elementet kan talte.

trans-unit.source: minRepeat is less than zero or larger than 255.
trans-unit.target: minRepeater mindre enn null eller større enn 255.

trans-unit.source: maxRepeat is less than zero or larger than 255.
trans-unit.target: maxRepeater mindre enn null eller større enn 255.

trans-unit.source: minRepeat is larger than maxRepeat.
trans-unit.target: minRepeater større enn maxRepeat.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a multiplying factor that adjusts the likelihood that an <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem"></xref> in a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf"></xref> object will be spoken.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en å multiplisere faktorer som justerer sannsynligheten som en <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem"> </xref> i en <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf"> </xref> objektet vil talte.

trans-unit.source: The default value of this property is 1.0, which is equivalent to no weighting of the item.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien for denne egenskapen er 1.0, som tilsvarer ingen vektingen for elementet.

trans-unit.source: A weight greater than 1.0 positively biases the likelihood that the item will be spoken, and a weight less than 1.0 negatively biases the likelihood that the item will be spoken.
trans-unit.target: En vekt som er større enn 1,0 biases positivt sannsynligheten at elementet skal talte, og en vekt som er mindre enn 1,0 negativt biases sannsynligheten at elementet skal talte.

trans-unit.source: This property is relevant only to <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> objects within an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> instance; it is ignored in all other cases.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen gjelder bare <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem>objekter i en <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf>serverforekomsten; ignoreres i alle andre tilfeller.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem>

trans-unit.source: A floating point value that adjusts the likelihood of this item being spoken.
trans-unit.target: Et flyttall-verdi som justerer sannsynligheten for dette elementet som talte.

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to set Weight to a negative value.
trans-unit.target: Er gjort forsøk på å angi vekt en negativ verdi.
